title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; streaming chat, pull, delete, etc.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick chatting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: Ollama on Awesome-Selfhosted
summary: Community discussion adding Ollama & WebUI to the popular self-hosted list.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama generators and chatters in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.
